channel.title: CVE Feed for WWBN -- AVideo
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WWBN -- AVideo

item.title: CVE-2022-30605|2024-08-03T06:56:12.863Z -- wwbn -- avideo
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability exists in the session id functionality of WWBN AVideo 11.6 and dev master commit 3f7c0364. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to increased privileges. An attacker can get an authenticated user to send a crafted HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-28710|2024-08-03T06:03:52.701Z -- wwbn -- avideo
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the chunkFile functionality of WWBN AVideo 11.6 and dev master commit 3f7c0364. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary file read. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-28712|2024-08-03T06:03:52.144Z -- wwbn -- avideo
item.description: A cross-site scripting (xss) vulnerability exists in the videoAddNew functionality of WWBN AVideo 11.6 and dev master commit 3f7c0364. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary Javascript execution. An attacker can get an authenticated user to send a crafted HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-30690|2024-08-03T06:56:13.456Z -- wwbn -- avideo
item.description: A cross-site scripting (xss) vulnerability exists in the image403 functionality of WWBN AVideo 11.6 and dev master commit 3f7c0364. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary Javascript execution. An attacker can get an authenticated user to send a crafted HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-26842|2024-08-03T05:11:44.498Z -- wwbn -- avideo
item.description: A reflected cross-site scripting (xss) vulnerability exists in the charts tab selection functionality of WWBN AVideo 11.6 and dev master commit 3f7c0364. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary Javascript execution. An attacker can get an authenticated user to send a crafted HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-29468|2024-08-03T06:26:05.170Z -- wwbn -- avideo
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability exists in WWBN AVideo 11.6 and dev master commit 3f7c0364. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to increased privileges. An attacker can get an authenticated user to send a crafted HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-30547|2024-08-03T06:48:36.343Z -- wwbn -- avideo
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability exists in the unzipDirectory functionality of WWBN AVideo 11.6 and dev master commit 3f7c0364. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-30534|2024-08-03T06:48:36.357Z -- wwbn -- avideo
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the aVideoEncoder chunkfile functionality of WWBN AVideo 11.6 and dev master commit 3f7c0364. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.
